basics.name: Benjamin Brajon
basics.title: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: I'm a dedicated student, ready to put in the effort in order to achieve my goals. I have a great discipline in the tasks assigned to me and always pay attention. I'm also able to make suggestions and enjoy working as part of a team. I'm comfortable in communication with large groups of people.

education.description: Currently a second-year computer science student in a bachelor at Lyon 1 University on the Bourg-en-Bresse campus
Secondary school final exam (2022), European section, Cinema option

highlights: Developing the online version of 'The Crew' (boardgame)
Front-end, web app, Back-end, Socket.io, Angular
Developed a showcase website in a team of 3 in 3 weeks
Created a website from scratch (including style guide and brand conception)
Started to develop a website for a GYM with two friends
Responsible for the style guide and the digital mockup

experience.description: Worked as a polyvalent crew member for McDonald's
Communication administrator for the IUT's student association
Worked as a grape picker for several days

projects.title: Online Boardgame
projects.description: Developing the online version of 'The Crew' (boardgame) using Angular, including front-end, web app, back-end, and Socket.io implementation.

projects.title: Showcase Website
projects.description: Developed a showcase website in a team of 3 in 3 weeks, creating a website from scratch including style guide and brand conception.

projects.title: GYM Website
projects.description: Started developing a website for a GYM with two friends. Responsible for the style guide and digital mockup as well as part of the front-end development.
